gr::ContextObject Class Reference
[Graphics rendering library]

#include <ContextObject.h>

Inheritance diagram for gr::ContextObject:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for rendering context dependent objects.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gr::ContextObject::ClassId
 

Context object class identifier.

Used by the implementation to avoid depending on RTTI.

Enumeration values:
CLASSID_PRIMITIVE  Geometric primitive (list) resource.

CLASSID_SHADER  Shader resource.

CLASSID_TEXTURE  Texture resource.

CLASSID_CUBETEXTURE  Cube texture resource.

CLASSID_PALETTE  Palette resource.

enum gr::ContextObject::LockType
 

Context objects need to be locked before raw data can be accessed.

Enumeration values:
LOCK_NONE  No lock.
LOCK_READ  Read-only lock.
LOCK_WRITE  Write-only lock.
LOCK_READWRITE  Read-write lock.

Member Function Documentation

ClassId gr::ContextObject::classId (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns class type id.

Used by the implementation to avoid depending on RTTI.

virtual void gr::ContextObject::lock (  LockType  lock  )  [virtual]
 

Locks object for specified access.

Default behaviour just returns the parameter, which in effect means that any object property can be accessed any time. Don't use this method directly, but use Lock handle/wrapper instead, which is exception-safe.

virtual LockType gr::ContextObject::locked (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns current lock state of the object.

Default state is LOCK_READWRITE (=object can be read or written any time).

virtual void gr::ContextObject::unlock (   )  [virtual]
 

Releases access to object.

Don't use this method directly, but use Lock handle/wrapper instead, which is exception-safe.
